summary: AN ORDINANCE accepting an easement over portions of Blocks 5, 6, and 7, Rainier Addition; and of Blocks 23, 32 and 33, Hill Tract Addition; and of vacated South Nye Place; and of vacated South Dearborn Street; and of vacated South Lane Street; and of vacated South Weller Street; and of vacated South King Street; and of vacated South Jackson Place; and of vacated 21st Avenue South; and of vacated alley in said Block 32, as said streets and alley were vacated under Ordinance No. 90340, for storm drain purposes. (Neighborhood Improvement Project, Contract 3-B; Sewer Improvement)
